content:
github-actions[bot] commented on issue #3049:

Subscribe to Label Action

cc @kubkon, @peterhuene

<details>
This issue or pull request has been labeled: "wasi", "wasmtime:c-api"

Thus the following users have been cc'd because of the following labels:

  • kubkon: wasi
  • peterhuene: wasmtime:c-api

To subscribe or unsubscribe from this label, edit the <code>.github/subscribe-to-label.json</code> configuration file.

Learn more.
</details>

sunfishcode commented on issue #3049:

The cargo deny failure is due to depending on multiple versions of rustc_version; I've submitted https://github.com/japaric/cast.rs/pull/34 to update cast to rustc_version, which wasmtime depends on through criterion.

olivierlemasle commented on issue #3049:

@sunfishcode Your pull request on cast.rs has been merged and a patch version released.

Updating cast to 0.2.7 and unsafe-io to 0.7.1 fixes the "cargo deny" failures.
